hero.subtitle: DRONE HUB for the Next Generation

sections.services_desc: Expert drone spraying and precision farming solutions tailored for modern agriculture.
sections.academy_desc: Knowledge hub for farmers and pilots to master precision agriculture technology.
sections.marketplace_desc: One-stop shop for high-quality agricultural equipment and supplies.
sections.community_desc: Join our growing community of smart farmers and professional drone pilots.
sections.promotion_desc: Exclusive deals and bundles for our dedicated community members.

loans.title: Financial Support for Smart Farming
loans.subtitle: Empowering farmers with accessible credit and modern technology guides.
loans.ccat_desc: Special low-interest credit program specifically designed for drone acquisition and smart farming systems.
loans.guide_step1_desc: Verify your farmer registration status and credit score eligibility.
loans.guide_step2_desc: Prepare your land titles, ID, and DRONE HUB quotation.
loans.guide_step3_desc: Meet with BAAC officers at your local branch for project evaluation.
loans.guide_step4_desc: Receive funds directly for your technology investment with up to 7 years repayment.

impl_subtitle: A professional roadmap to transforming your farm with DRONE HUB technology.
impl_step1_desc: Formalize your agricultural status and conduct a baseline land assessment. Identify your specific yield goals—whether it's increasing jasmine rice aroma or reducing chemical waste.
impl_step1_action: Action: Complete farmer registration at your local MOAC office.
impl_step2_desc: Consult with DRONE HUB engineers to match drone capabilities (Drone Kraset Gen Y) to your topography. A 50-rai flat field requires different precision than a terraced orchard.
impl_step2_action: Action: Request a customized DRONE HUB ecosystem quotation.
impl_step3_desc: Leverage our partnership with BAAC. Present your DRONE HUB technical plan to access CCAT low-interest credit designed specifically for smart tech adoption.
impl_step3_action: Action: Submit loan application with DRONE HUB tech-assurance badge.
impl_step4_desc: Undergo training at our Smart Academy. Deploy your fleet using our unified OS for real-time monitoring and autonomous mission execution.
impl_step4_action: Action: Launch first autonomous mission and track ROI via dashboard.
scenario_desc: In Nakhon Nayok, a 100-rai farm utilized the CCAT loan to deploy a 3-drone fleet. Result: 40% reduction in fertilizer costs and a 15% increase in premium grain grade within the first season.
takeaway_2: Unified Drone Kraset Gen Y management

seo.title: Drone Farming | Rice Quality Improvement with Precision Agriculture
seo.description: Elevate rice quality and taste with drone farming and precision spraying. Discover how our Smart Farm increases yield and income for farmers.

hero.title: Innovative Drone Hub Farm
hero.subtitle: Elevating rice quality to global standards through Precision Agriculture. Better taste, higher yield, and sustainable cost reduction.

science.title: The Science Behind the Taste
science.desc: High-precision drone spraying ensures plants receive micro-nutrients consistently, directly impacting starch synthesis and aroma in rice grains.
